article.div: I am graduating in Summer 2018 and am on the job market for academic positions. (my CV, research, and teaching statement)

div.div:
Email: antoinek@cs.washington.edu
Office: CSE 591
Address:
University of Washington
Computer Science & Engineering
Box 352350
Seattle, WA 98195-2350, USA

div.p:
I am currently a PhD student in the systems lab of the
Allen School of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Washington with
Tom Anderson as my advisor. In addition I am collaborating closely with Simon Peter and
Arvind Krishnamurthy. My research interests lie in the general area of operating systems and networks, with a primary focus on the data center.

ul.li: 2017-03-27: Naveen presented our paper "Evaluating the Power of Flexible Packet Processing for Network Resource Allocation" at NSDI.
